name: Raspbian Backports
short_description:
This is a repository for Raspbian, containing backports of various packages from the Debian APT repositories.

Use the "Suggest New Backport" link above if you wish to suggest a new package to be backported, or to provide a backport you have made yourself.
summary: Backports of Debian apps for Raspbian
